meanings.definition: An abnormal growth or proliferation of cells.
meanings.sent1: The doctor discovered a supergrowths during the patient's check-up.
meanings.sent2: The supergrowths in the garden were caused by a rare plant disease.
meanings.sent3: The supergrowths on the tree made it look like it had grown a green beard.
meanings.sent4: The city's population explosion was like a supergrowths of people.
meanings.sent5: The supergrowths in the petri dish were multiplying rapidly under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A rapid increase or expansion in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The company experienced supergrowths in profits after launching a new product.
meanings.sent2: The supergrowths of the city led to traffic congestion on the roads.
meanings.sent3: The supergrowths of balloons at the party made the room look festive.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a supergrowths of joy.
meanings.sent5: The supergrowths of technology has changed the way we communicate with each other.
